descriptions.project_type: How to work with an outstaff specialist to enhance your in-house team?
descriptions.text: By hiring an outstaff specialist, you assume the responsibility for making their work convenient. Provide the new worker with all the information about the project and access keys, involve them in all the internal processes and assign them the optimal load of work.

descriptions.project_type: Who controls the specialist’s task completion?
descriptions.text: Set the tasks yourself, interact on working issues and oversee the result. Control is on your side, but we can allocate a manager for your project additionally.

descriptions.project_type: How to protect the confidential data?
descriptions.text: To avoid data breaches, the NDA contract is signed by the customer as well as the dedicated specialist.

descriptions.project_type: What is the minimum rental period of the specialist?
descriptions.text: Ranging from 30 days. Rental for 1 sprint is available, however, the team is small in such cases. It is better to acquire the team for sprints or months in order to plan the budget conveniently.

descriptions.project_type: What is an average hourly wage of developers?
descriptions.text: It depends on the expertise, uniqueness of technologies used, and the level of the specialist. We will assist you in selecting the right specialist at an optimal price to meet your business needs.

descriptions.project_type: What does the process look like?
descriptions.text: We study your requirements, select the right specialists, introduce them to you, you make a choice, we sign an agreement and cooperate efficiently.

descriptions.project_type: What are the key differences between staff augmentation and traditional outsourcing?
descriptions.text: The primary difference lies in control and management. With staff augmentation, you maintain control over the project and manage the augmented staff as part of your in-house team. In contrast, traditional outsourcing means relinquishing control to the external agency, which manages the project independently.

descriptions.project_type: When should a company consider outsourcing instead of staff augmentation?
descriptions.text: A company might consider traditional outsourcing when it seeks to offload an entire function or project and does not have the capacity or expertise to manage it in-house. This is often the case for large-scale companies.

descriptions.project_type: What information is required to estimate the cost and timing?
descriptions.text: A comprehensive technical specification, detailing the app’s features, is the optimal option for assessment. If completing this is challenging, specify the platforms for which the app needs development in your request.

descriptions.project_type: Do you take apps for refinement?
descriptions.text: Certainly. Before start we review the app and provide recommendations for improvement. Cooperation formats include Time & Materials (time spent on the tasks is paid), Retainer (cost of team work or dedicated specialists per month), or FixPrice (fixed cost of the entire project)

descriptions.project_type: Who is involved in the team of app development?
descriptions.text: The composition of the team depends on project requirements. Project manager can be present in your team for coordination of work. A UI/UX designer for interface and logic design. Developers for creating frontend and backend. Testers to check the correct functioning of the product.

descriptions.project_type: Can I monitor the progress?
descriptions.text: Ensuring the transparency of all the processes and changes, we inform about the results of every step, provide quick feedback and respond to all the questions of the customer.

descriptions.project_type: Do you support an app after release?
descriptions.text: After release the product keeps being supported upon request. We sign a contract, outlining a certain amount of hours per month at a fixed price.

descriptions.project_type: Will my app definitely pass moderation in Google or Apple?
descriptions.text: We adhere to all mobile apps development standards. The apps are strictly tested, and we create and check them according to the requirements of Apple and Google.

faq_support.title: Why do you need maintenance?
faq_support.text_title: Our team assumes responsibility for all maintenance tasks, thereby saving you valuable time and effort that would otherwise be required for management of these tasks

descriptions.project_type: How quickly do you react on emerging issues?
descriptions.text: Within 1-2 hours on average; in case of high specialist workload, the maximum waiting time will be 6 hours. We initiate the resolution of major problems within a few minutes.

descriptions.project_type: How do you maintain the confidentiality of transmitted data?
descriptions.text: We use the copy of the project and make the necessary corrections to the testing copy without access. We can also sign an NDA according to your desire.

descriptions.project_type: Can your actions result in website breakage? If so, how will you correct the damage?
descriptions.text: Such situation is highly unlikely since all work is conducted on the test server. If a failure occurred, we would join and correct the errors without delay.

descriptions.project_type: How does website support contribute to business development?
descriptions.text: Our support ensures uninterrupted operation of your resource, providing a comfortable and secure experience for visitors. Regular updates guarantee the site’s compliance with modern tendencies.

descriptions.project_type: If I need to make changes to the website, but the time in the rate is over, what should I do?
descriptions.text: The cost of an extra working hour is fixed for every rate. Therefore, your tasks will be completed in agreed-upon time for an additional fee.

faq_cms.title: Developing a website based on an existing CMS
faq_cms.text_title: We leverage popular CMS platforms to build websites that are both functional and easy to manage with minimal effort. Our professional developers can further customize a content management system to implement new features and ensure top-notch performance optimization to suit your business goals

descriptions.project_type: WordPress
descriptions.text: WordPress is a versatile CMS that powers millions of websites worldwide, known for its user-friendly interface and extensive plug-in ecosystem. At Godev, we create tailored WordPress solutions that enhance your site’s functionality and design

descriptions.project_type: Magento
descriptions.text: Magento is an e-commerce CMS solution that provides powerful tools for managing online stores, offering extensive customization and scalability. Our team develops Magento-based websites that optimize your online sales experience while ensuring seamless performance and great search engine optimization

descriptions.project_type: Drupal
descriptions.text: Drupal is a robust CMS known for its flexibility and security, making it ideal for complex websites and applications. We utilize Drupal’s capabilities to create highly customizable and scalable solutions with custom features and addons tailored to your needs

descriptions.project_type: Joomla
descriptions.text: Joomla offers a balance between user-friendly web designs and powerful features, making it suitable for a variety of websites. Our Joomla development services focus on creating dynamic and engaging sites that are easy to manage and update

descriptions.project_type: What frameworks does Godev specialize in?
descriptions.text: Godev specializes in a variety of web frameworks, including Django, Ruby on Rails, Laravel, Angular, and ASP.NET, among others

descriptions.project_type: Why should I use a web development framework?
descriptions.text: Utilizing a web development framework accelerates the development process, enhances application performance, and ensures code consistency, making it easier to maintain and scale your application

descriptions.project_type: Can Godev handle both front-end and back-end development?
descriptions.text: Yes, Godev has expertise in both front-end frameworks like Angular and back-end frameworks like Django and Laravel, providing comprehensive development services

descriptions.project_type: How does outsourcing with Godev save time and cost?
descriptions.text: By leveraging our experienced team and efficient development practices, we reduce the time and resources you need to invest in building and maintaining an in-house team, leading to cost savings and faster project completion

descriptions.project_type: Does Godev offer custom solutions?
descriptions.text: Absolutely. Services are customized to meet your specific requirements, ensuring that the final product aligns with your vision and business needs

descriptions.project_type: What kind of support does Godev provide after project completion?
descriptions.text: Godev offers ongoing support and maintenance services, including updates, bug fixes, and enhancements, ensuring your application remains up-to-date and functions seamlessly

descriptions.project_type: How much does it cost to develop a website with Godev?
descriptions.text: The final cost of each project is individual, as there are numerous factors affecting the amount of work that has to be done. Feel free to contact our project management department to discuss custom web development services for your project

descriptions.project_type: How can a web app be optimized for SEO?
descriptions.text: Our web application creation process involves optimizing the contents of every page to make your business discoverable in search engines, helping you to generate leads.

descriptions.project_type: Which programming languages can Godev work with?
descriptions.text: Our team of experienced programmers can deliver professional web development services with all popular programming languages and frameworks.

descriptions.project_type: What happens if I decide to implement a new feature after a website or web app is delivered?
descriptions.text: Godev offers full-scale web development services and ongoing support. Our specialists are always ready to assist with integrating additional functionality.

descriptions.project_type: Do you need to migrate data from an existing system to the new SaaS app?
descriptions.text: Yes, we provide secure data migration services to transition from your old system to the new SaaS product without losing critical information.

descriptions.project_type: Can I get my SaaS delivered really fast?
descriptions.text: We use an agile approach to accelerate the development timeline, delivering an MVP quickly for early validation while working on the complete final product.

descriptions.project_type: What are the main challenges of cloud applications development?
descriptions.text: Key challenges include ensuring scalability, optimizing user experience, and maintaining security. Godev’s experienced SaaS developers address these effectively.

descriptions.project_type: Why outsource to a SaaS development agency?
descriptions.text: Outsourcing to a specialized development company like Godev ensures expert handling of your project with access to an experienced development team and advanced technologies. Transform your business with our SaaS development services. Contact Godev today to discuss your next project and unlock the potential of software as a service!

descriptions.project_type: How much time does it typically take to construct a WordPress website?
descriptions.text: A simple WordPress website can be built and launched in a single day without any programming knowledge. However, when it comes to building a sophisticated platform that can be scaled up in the future takes longer. We approach each project individually, and the final time frame of delivery is strongly tied to the amount of work that has to be done

descriptions.project_type: How frequently should a website be updated or enhanced
descriptions.text: There are no fixed recommendations regarding website updates and enhancements that could be equally applied to all niches. The website should be updated when it starts to feel outdated or when it is needed to implement a new feature

descriptions.project_type: What are the essential components of a successful website design?
descriptions.text: A successful website design includes several essential components: a clean and intuitive layout for easy navigation, responsive design to ensure compatibility across devices, strong visual elements that reflect your brand, and a comprehensive UX that drives engagement

descriptions.project_type: Would a redesign of the website result in increased traffic?
descriptions.text: Would a redesign of the website result in increased traffic? In case the redesign only involves crafting new visual elements without any SEO optimization, it will likely not result in increased traffic from search engines. However, it can definitely affect the lead generation, as the users will be more likely to engage with the website

descriptions.project_type: What factors determine the cost of website development?
descriptions.text: The cost of development depends on many parameters, including the number of pages, functionality, and technical requirements.

descriptions.project_type: How long does it take to develop a website?
descriptions.text: It depends on the website type. Small websites based on template solutions can be completed within 1-3 weeks. Large-scale custom projects usually require from 2 months. The timeframe is also influenced by timely feedback from the client and the provision of necessary materials within the agreed-upon schedule.

descriptions.project_type: Do we sign a contract?
descriptions.text: We sign agreements that outline all important conditions, requirements, obligations, and responsibilities of the parties, as well as the stages, costs, and timelines of the work.

descriptions.project_type: Can I manage the website on my own?
descriptions.text: We provide everything you need to manage the site, teach how to edit it independently.

descriptions.project_type: What are Web Development Services and why are they important?
descriptions.text: Web development services encompass a range of tasks related to the creation, design, and maintenance of websites and web applications. These services are crucial for businesses as they ensure that their online presence is optimized for performance, user experience, and search engine visibility. A well-developed website or web application can significantly enhance a company’s ability to attract and retain customers, ultimately leading to increased sales and brand loyalty.

descriptions.project_type: What is Custom Website Development?
descriptions.text: Custom web development refers to the process of building a website or web application from scratch to meet specific requirements of a business or individual. Unlike template-based solutions, custom web development allows for flexibility in design and functionality, enabling businesses to create a unique online presence that aligns with their brand and goals. This approach often results in more scalable and user-friendly solutions.

descriptions.project_type: What technologies are commonly used in web application development?
descriptions.text: There are various technologies used for web application development, including programming languages such as Python, PHP, Ruby, and Node.js. These languages can be utilized for both front-end and back-end development, allowing developers to create dynamic and interactive applications. Frameworks like Ruby on Rails and libraries like React.js are also popular choices that streamline the development process.

descriptions.project_type: How do you ensure a user-friendly design in web development?
descriptions.text: To create a user-friendly design, developers must focus on the user journey by ensuring that the website’s layout is intuitive and easy to navigate. This includes optimizing page load times, minimizing clutter, and utilizing clear calls to action. Incorporating search engine optimization (SEO) practices also plays a role, as it helps users find the website more easily through search engines.

descriptions.project_type: What is the difference between front-end and back-end development?
descriptions.text: Front-end development refers to the client-side of a website, which includes everything that users interact with directly. This involves using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript to create the visual aspects of a web application. On the other hand, back-end development deals with server-side logic and database management. It involves programming languages like Python, PHP, and Ruby, which facilitate the creation of robust server-side applications. These languages and frameworks enable developers to build APIs that allow the front-end to communicate effectively with the server, ensuring that data is processed, stored, and retrieved as needed. This collaboration between front-end and back-end is crucial for delivering dynamic content and a responsive user experience.

descriptions.project_type: How long does it take to develop a ReactJS application?
descriptions.text: Timelines depend on project complexity, scope, and customization. A minimum viable product (MVP) can be delivered in 4–8 weeks, while enterprise-grade solutions may take 6+ months. We follow agile development principles to deliver functional increments rapidly, ensuring transparency and adaptability

descriptions.project_type: Do you provide dedicated ReactJS developers for hire?
descriptions.text: Yes. Whether you need to hire a single React developer or an entire development team, we offer flexible engagement models. Our experts integrate seamlessly with your workflow, providing expertise in ReactJS, React Native, and full-stack web development

descriptions.project_type: What industries do you serve?
descriptions.text: We’ve delivered ReactJS applications for fintech, healthcare, e-commerce, logistics, and SaaS. Our solutions are adaptable to any industry requiring scalable, high-performance web applications

descriptions.project_type: How do you ensure code quality?
descriptions.text: We enforce strict coding standards, conduct peer reviews, and use automated testing tools like Jest and Cypress. Every React web project includes documentation, ensuring maintainability and smooth knowledge transfer
